name: public-spotify-queue
description: Allows Spotify users to broadcast not only their current listening song, but as well as their queues

scripts.test: cross-env DEBUG=psq:* TEST_SERVER="http://localhost" TEST_PORT=5000 TEST=true CLIENT_ID=clientid CLIENT_SECRET=secret ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --reporter mochawesome ./test/skiplist.test.js ./test/mockserver.test.js ./test/server.test.js

apidoc.name: Public Spotify Queue
apidoc.description: REST API endpoints for Public Spotify Queue
apidoc.title: Public Spotify Queue API
